responses.body:
{
  "action": "{{oneOf (array 'getAllSettings')}}",
  "data": {
    "settings": {
      "allowed_networks": [
        {
          "allowed_networks": [
            "192.168.40.0/24"
          ],
          "id": "root"
        }
      ],
      "change_message_prompt": "Please provide a reason for this change",
      "display_recent_changes_graphs": true,
      "enable_change_message": true,
      "enable_change_request": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "enable_javascript_directives": "enabled",
      "enable_self_deployment": true,
      "enable_self_validation": true,
      "first_run_hour": {{faker 'random.number'}},
      "first_run_minute": {{faker 'random.number'}},
      "global_policy_mode": "{{oneOf (array 'enforce' 'audit')}}",
      "global_policy_mode_overridable": true,
      "heartbeat_frequency": 10,
      "log_all_reports": true,
      "mandatory_change_message": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "modified_file_ttl": 7,
      "node_accept_duplicated_hostname": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "node_onaccept_default_policyMode": "{{oneOf (array 'default' 'enforce' 'audit')}}",
      "node_onaccept_default_state": "{{oneOf (array 'enabled' 'ignored' 'empty-policies' 'initializing' 'preparing-eol')}}",
      "output_file_ttl": 7,
      "relay_server_synchronization_method": "{{oneOf (array 'classic' 'rsync' 'disabled')}}",
      "relay_server_synchronize_policies": true,
      "relay_server_synchronize_shared_files": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "reporting_mode": "{{oneOf (array 'full-compliance' 'changes-only' 'reports-disabled')}}",
      "require_time_synchronization": true,
      "rsyslog_reporting_protocol": "{{oneOf (array 'TCP' 'UDP')}}",
      "rudder_compute_changes": true,
      "rudder_compute_dyngroups_max_parallelism": "1",
      "rudder_generation_compute_dyngroups": true,
      "rudder_generation_continue_on_error": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "rudder_generation_delay": "0 seconds",
      "rudder_generation_js_timeout": 30,
      "rudder_generation_max_parallelism": "x0.5",
      "rudder_generation_policy": "all",
      "rudder_report_protocol_default": "{{oneOf (array 'HTTPS' 'SYSLOG')}}",
      "rudder_save_db_compliance_details": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "rudder_save_db_compliance_levels": true,
      "rudder_verify_certificates": {{faker 'random.boolean'}},
      "run_frequency": 5,
      "send_metrics": "not defined",
      "splay_time": 5,
      "syslog_protocol_disabled": true,
      "unexpected_allows_duplicate": true,
      "unexpected_unbound_var_values": true
    }
  },
  "result": "{{oneOf (array 'success' 'error')}}"
}
